name: Rocket Trail
description:
IMPORTANT: once the game has loaded and it says 'press any key to start' please click on the game.

You're the green ship; the red ones want to kill you...

Lead the enemies into their own bullets, survive for as long as possible.

Use W.A.S.D or the arrow keys to move around.

Made by Alex Daley in under 48 hours as part of the 2018 'Game Maker's Toolkit' Game Jam. The theme was 'Genre Without Mechanic'. This is a 'Shoot-em-up' (SHMUP) game without the ability for the player to shoot.

Tools: 
Engine: Unity 2.6f1
Art: Pyxel Edit
Font: m5x7 (made by Daniel Linssen: https://managore.itch.io/m5x7 )
